title: Bonus Episode: Rich Kleiman On Being Kevin Durant's Manager, Marijuana, & Much More
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro In The Morning sits down with sports manager and businessman Rich Kleiman sits down to discuss on various topics in sports including the Brooklyn Nets and New York Knicks, Kevin Durant, Kyrie Irving, and also discuss some of his investments and updates to The Boardroom!
